name: Puzzle Dozer
description:
Puzzle Dozer is a challenging strategy/skill game featuring intuitive controls and a sophisticated physics engine.
Move all wooden boxes into specially marked areas using a small caterpillar dozer. But always keep an eye on the fuel display and the many dangerous and tricky items.
Prove your skills in various environments, including the wavy high seas and orbital stations in zero gravity!

- Got featured in NEW AND NOTEWORTHY

- Got featured in the HOT NEW GAMES section
